en-IN.description: Turn your Echo into a smart AI assistant. Ask anything and get intelligent answers powered by Google Gemini.
en-IN.name: The Oracle - AI Assistant
en-IN.summary: Ask anything and get smart AI-powered answers via Google Gemini.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: 1. Say 'Alexa, open the oracle'. 2. Ask any question. 3. Say 'tell me more' for follow-ups.
